description: This file defines an Angular component named WishlistComponent, which is responsible for displaying and managing a user's wishlist. It imports necessary Angular modules and services, utilizes dependency injection, and interacts with a WishlistService to fetch and modify wishlist data.

classes.name: WishlistComponent
classes.description: An Angular component for displaying and managing a user's wishlist, including loading items, refreshing the list, and removing products.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that initializes the component and triggers the first wishlist refresh.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches the current wishlist from the service and updates the component state.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a product from the wishlist and refreshes the list.
